parameter.description: actual executable name with for path
parameter.name: command

value.description: An implementation of Job, that does absolutely nothing
value.name: NoJob

value.description: A Job which sends an e-mail with the configured content to the configured * recipient
value.name: SendMailJob

parameter.description: host name of the smtp server
parameter.name: smtp_host

parameter.description: e-mail address to send the mail to.
parameter.name: recipient

parameter.description: e-mail address to cc the mail
parameter.name: cc_recipient

parameter.description: e-mail address to claim the mail is from.
parameter.name: sender

parameter.description: e-mail address the message should say to reply to.
parameter.name: reply_to

parameter.description: subject to place on the e-mail
parameter.name: subject
